title: Putting It All Together
content:
Now it’s your turn to answer a scientific question by creating a representative color image and explaining what it reveals.

Think about these points before you begin:

  • What would you like to investigate? What question do you want to answer?
      Here are some options:
    • Look through a dusty nebula to see what’s inside
    • Search for a faraway galaxy
    • Locate the hot young stars in a galaxy
    • Identify star-forming regions in a galaxy

question.title: Question #1
question.label: What filters will be most appropriate for conducting your investigation? Why? (Note: you must use at least two filters.)

question.title: Question #1
question.label: Develop your chromatic ordering sequence. (What colors will you assign to each filter?)
